org.atmosphere.cpr

Class AtmosphereResourceEventImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.atmosphere.cpr.AtmosphereResourceEventImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AtmosphereResourceEvent

    public class AtmosphereResourceEventImpl
extends Object
implements AtmosphereResourceEvent
    AtmosphereResourceEvent implementation for Servlet Container.
    Author:
    Jeanfrancois Arcand

      • isClosedByClient

        public boolean isClosedByClient()
        Return true if the client closed the connection and send the Atmosphere close message. You must use the OnDisconnectInterceptor in order to receive the proper value, and enableProtocol set to true on the client side (enabledProtocol is true by default).
        Specified by:
        isClosedByClient in interface AtmosphereResourceEvent
        Returns:
